alert.note: Alert for Caswell (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 7:37PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Rockingham and Caswell Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 737 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Quick, or near Camp Springs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yanceyville... Bethel... Providence... Jericho... Camp Springs... Quick... and Blanch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central North Carolina...and south central Virginia.
